name: com.indiegabo.handy-bus
description: A solution that creates an Event Bus to be used in any project.

scripts.pre-release: npx auto-changelog -p && mv -f CHANGELOG.md ../../docfx_project/documentation/CHANGELOG.md && docfx ../../docfx_project/docfx.json && echo Go create Unity .meta and the .unitypackage before releasing
